responsibilities: Serve as the primary contact and be embedded within product development on all AI and generative AI legal issues, related tooling contracts, and technology terms, product features, and development priorities.
Provide legal advice across subject areas offering risk mitigation strategies for products across multiple jurisdictions.

Collaborate with diverse teams in product business and other operators across the organization to facilitate the employment of AI and generative AI technology in service of company strategy and product goals.
Partner with internal clients to develop governance, risk, and product review frameworks for the deployment and use of generative AI.
Contribute as a subject matter expert in discussions of general business issues and work well with clients, from senior leaders to line operating personnel.
Collaborate with other subject matter experts and consolidate multiple legal considerations into clear guidance to stakeholders.
Organize, plan, coordinate, and implement large and ongoing projects.

Draft and negotiate a variety of AI-related contracts, including those related to technology, software, vendor tools, and intellectual property ensuring terms align with company goals while mitigating risks and protecting intellectual property assets.
Develop house positions on multiple terms and considerations to promote efficiency.
Ensure compliance with applicable laws, regulations, and industry standards related to AI technology and advise on ethical and legal considerations in the design and use of generative AI products.
Proactively monitor developments in technology law, industry trends, and address potential legal challenges to provide updates on product and AI developments.
Educate and train teams on legal implications and best practices in technology, media, and the importance of product counseling.
Demonstrate support and understanding of the value of journalistic independence and a commitment to the mission to seek the truth and help people understand the world.
category: Prompt Engineering and Large Language Models (LLMs)
activity: Fine-tuning and customization of language models
analysis: The Job Responsibilities focus on legal aspects of AI and generative AI, including providing legal advice, drafting contracts, and ensuring compliance with laws and regulations. There is no mention of technical tasks such as training or fine-tuning language models. The responsibilities are more aligned with legal and strategic governance rather than technical development or customization of AI models.
